meanings.definition: Lacking a climax or peak moment.
meanings.sent1: The story was climaxless, with no exciting ending.
meanings.sent2: The movie felt a bit climaxless, as it didn't have a thrilling scene.
meanings.sent3: The party was so climaxless that even the balloons seemed bored.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like a climaxless rollercoaster, slowly moving without any sudden drops.
meanings.sent5: The journey up the mountain was so climaxless that reaching the top felt anticlimactic.

meanings.definition: Without a high point or culmination.
meanings.sent1: The book's plot was climaxless, lacking a big moment.
meanings.sent2: The concert was a bit climaxless, missing a grand finale.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so climaxless that even the candles seemed unimpressed.
meanings.sent4: His argument was like a climaxless fireworks show, all noise but no grand display.
meanings.sent5: The game was so climaxless that winning felt almost ordinary.
